    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        This is the main method.
        Parameters:
        args - is a ArrayList of Strings.
        args - args[0] The user's option that chooses to counts the lines. Where 'loc' counts the lines without commentaries and 'phy' counts all the lines.
        args - args[1] The file's location whose lines the user wants to be counted.

      • ReadLine

        public static ArrayList<String> ReadLine(String option,
                                         String locationFile)
        This method read and save the lines in the ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        option - The option of the user.
        locationFile - The file's location.
        Returns:
        ArrayList String, save the lines of the read file.

      • ExceptionLine

        public static boolean ExceptionLine(String excepLine)
        This method verify if the line is a commentary, null or not.
        Parameters:
        excepLine - String, excepLine is the line of file to check.
        Returns:
        boolean, if the value is True so the line not is a commentary, otherwise is a commentary.
